item.title: 🐘 Sowmiya-Govindaraj/Ecommerce-application (12 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Sowmiya-Govindaraj

📝 Repository: Sowmiya-Govindaraj/Ecommerce-application

📄 Descrizione: This project is a Java-based e-commerce platform with MySQL database integration using PHP for backend connectivity. The system allows users to browse products, manage carts, place orders, and enables admins to manage products and orders efficiently.

⭐ Stelle: 12

item.title: 🐘 hosseinhezami/laravel-permission-manager (12 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: hosseinhezami

📝 Repository: hosseinhezami/laravel-permission-manager

📄 Descrizione: A comprehensive and advanced permission management system for Laravel applications. This package provides a robust role-based access control (RBAC) system with support for wildcard permissions, blade directives, Artisan commands, and a fluent API.

⭐ Stelle: 12
